items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: A juicy cheeseburger, a classic American comfort food.  It's a delightful combination of flavors and textures.

items.name: Cheese sandwich
items.description: A satisfying and simple cheese sandwich. A perfect choice for a quick and tasty meal.

items.name: Chicken burgers
items.description: Delicious chicken burgers with a crispy texture and flavorful taste. A popular choice for a meal.

items.name: Spicy chicken
items.description: Spicy chicken dish featuring a fiery blend of flavors, ideal for those who enjoy a spicy meal.

items.name: Hot dog
items.description: A classic hot dog, a simple yet satisfying meal. The perfect quick and easy food.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: A refreshing fruit salad, a light and healthy appetizer. Perfect for those looking for a light meal.

items.name: Cocktails
items.description: A variety of delicious cocktails, perfect for an evening out. A delightful selection of mixed drinks.

items.name: Nuggets
items.description: Crispy nuggets, a flavorful and satisfying appetizer. A perfect addition to any meal.

items.name: Sandwich
items.description: A delicious sandwich, perfect as an appetizer. Ideal for a quick and satisfying meal.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy and golden french fries, a classic appetizer and side dish. A perfect addition to any meal.

items.name: Milk Shake
items.description: A creamy and delicious milk shake, a refreshing and satisfying beverage.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: A refreshing and cooling iced tea, a perfect beverage for a hot day.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: A healthy and refreshing orange juice, a great choice for a quick drink.

items.name: Lemon Tea
items.description: A refreshing and tangy lemon tea, a perfect beverage for a refreshing drink.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: A rich and aromatic coffee, a perfect drink for a morning or afternoon.
